mapper.delete: DELETE from sys_role_menu WHERE id IN ( select * from (SELECT srm.id FROM sys_role_menu srm LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON srm.role_id = sr.role_id WHERE sr.address_info_id = #{addressInfoId} AND srm.menu_id NOT IN (SELECT menu_id FROM sys_role_menu WHERE role_id = #{roleId})) a )
mapper.select: select srm.menu_id from sys_role_menu srm left join sys_role sr on srm.role_id = sr.role_id where sr.role_id = #{roleId} and sr.status = 0
